short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SocialBu is a social media management and automation platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SocialBu is a social media management and automation tool. It allows you to manage your social media efficiently and save time. You don't need to spend so much time managing your social media.

You can schedule and publish content to multiple social media accounts across different social media networks, engage and interact with your fans and followers, and create automation rules to automate repetitive actions on your social media.

With the SocialBu chrome extension, you can create posts directly on any web page. It allows you to share content from anywhere on the internet without having to go to your SocialBu account or any other social media account.
